questions.question: What is $3 + 4 \times 2$?
questions.hint: Remember PEMDAS! Which operation should you do first: addition or multiplication?

questions.question: What is $10 - 2 \times 3$?
questions.hint: Multiplication comes before subtraction. What is $2 \times 3$, and then what happens?

questions.question: What is $(5 + 3) \times 2$?
questions.hint: Parentheses come first! Solve what's inside the parentheses, then multiply.

questions.question: What is $12 \div 4 + 2$?
questions.hint: Division before addition. What do you get when you divide first?

questions.question: What is $6 + 8 \div 2$?
questions.hint: Don't go left to right! Which operation has priority here?

questions.question: What is $2 \times 3 + 4 \times 5$?
questions.hint: Do all multiplications first, then add the results together.

questions.question: What is $(10 - 4) \times 3$?
questions.hint: What's inside the parentheses? Solve that first, then multiply.

questions.question: What is $20 - 3 \times 5$?
questions.hint: Multiplication before subtraction! Don't subtract first.

questions.question: What is $4 + 6 \div 3$?
questions.hint: Division has priority over addition. Divide first, then add.

questions.question: What is $(8 + 2) \div 5$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! Add what's inside, then divide by 5.

questions.question: What is $15 - 10 \div 2$?
questions.hint: Don't subtract first! Division comes before subtraction.

questions.question: What is $3 \times (4 + 2)$?
questions.hint: Solve the parentheses first. What is $4 + 2$? Then multiply by 3.

questions.question: What is $24 \div 6 \times 2$?
questions.hint: Same priority, so go left to right. Divide first, then multiply.

questions.question: What is $5 + 3 \times 2 - 1$?
questions.hint: Multiply first! Then do the addition and subtraction from left to right.

questions.question: What is $(12 - 8) + 6$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $12 - 8$? Then add 6.

questions.question: What is $8 \times 2 \div 4$?
questions.hint: Same level operations, so work left to right. Multiply, then divide.

questions.question: What is $9 + 6 \div 3 - 2$?
questions.hint: Division first! Then add and subtract from left to right.

questions.question: What is $(5 \times 2) + (3 \times 4)$?
questions.hint: Solve each parentheses first, then add the two results.

questions.question: What is $100 \div 10 \div 2$?
questions.hint: Same level, go left to right. Don't do $10 \div 2$ first!

questions.question: What is $7 + 3 \times (2 + 1)$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then multiplication, then addition.

questions.question: What is $18 - 12 \div 3$?
questions.hint: Division before subtraction. What is $12 \div 3$?

questions.question: What is $2 + 2 \times 2 + 2$?
questions.hint: Only the middle multiplication happens first. Then add the rest.

questions.question: What is $(15 - 5) \div 2$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $15 - 5$? Then divide.

questions.question: What is $4 \times 5 - 3 \times 2$?
questions.hint: Do both multiplications first, then subtract.

questions.question: What is $36 \div (6 - 3)$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $6 - 3$? Then divide 36 by that.

questions.question: What is $8 - 4 + 2$?
questions.hint: Same level operations. Go left to right: subtract, then add.

questions.question: What is $5 \times (8 - 3)$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $8 - 3$? Then multiply by 5.

questions.question: What is $16 \div 4 + 12 \div 3$?
questions.hint: Do both divisions first, then add the results.

questions.question: What is $(3 + 7) \times (2 + 3)$?
questions.hint: Solve both parentheses first, then multiply the results.

questions.question: What is $30 - 5 \times 4$?
questions.hint: Multiplication before subtraction! What is $5 \times 4$?

questions.question: What is $6 \times 6 \div 9$?
questions.hint: Same level, go left to right. Multiply first, then divide.

questions.question: What is $1 + 2 \times 3 + 4$?
questions.hint: Only the multiplication happens first. Then add all the numbers.

questions.question: What is $(20 + 4) \div 6$?
questions.hint: Add inside the parentheses first, then divide.

questions.question: What is $10 - 2 + 8 \div 2$?
questions.hint: Division first! Then add and subtract from left to right.

questions.question: What is $3 \times 3 \times 3$?
questions.hint: Multiply left to right. $3 \times 3 = 9$, then $9 \times$ what?

questions.question: What is $40 \div (4 + 4)$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $4 + 4$? Then divide 40 by that.

questions.question: What is $7 \times 2 - 3 \times 3$?
questions.hint: Do both multiplications first, then subtract.

questions.question: What is $25 - 15 + 10$?
questions.hint: Same level, go left to right. Subtract first, then add.

questions.question: What is $(6 \times 4) \div (2 \times 3)$?
questions.hint: Solve both parentheses first, then divide.

questions.question: What is $50 - 10 \times 3 + 5$?
questions.hint: Multiplication first! Then do subtraction and addition left to right.

questions.question: What is $5 + 5 \times 5$?
questions.hint: Multiplication before addition! What is $5 \times 5$?

questions.question: What is $(9 - 3) \times 4$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! Subtract inside, then multiply by 4.

questions.question: What is $14 \div 7 + 3$?
questions.hint: Division comes before addition. Divide first, then add.

questions.question: What is $8 + 4 \times 3 - 2$?
questions.hint: Multiply first! Then add and subtract from left to right.

questions.hint: Add inside the parentheses first, then divide.

questions.hint: Same priority, go left to right. Divide first, then multiply.

questions.hint: Same level operations. Go left to right: subtract, then add.

questions.question: What is $2 \times (10 - 5)$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is $10 - 5$? Then multiply by 2.

questions.question: What is $45 \div 9 + 6$?
questions.hint: Division before addition. Divide first, then add.

questions.question: What is $3 + 6 \times 2 - 4$?
questions.hint: Multiply first! Then add and subtract from left to right.

questions.question: What is $(4 + 8) \div 3$?
questions.hint: Add inside the parentheses first, then divide.
